commentText:
The MongoIterable is the results from an operation, such as a {@code find()} or an {@code aggregate()} query.

This class somewhat mimics the behavior of an {@link Iterable} but given its results are obtained asynchronously, its values are wrapped inside a {@code Task}.
name: MongoIterable

tags.name: @param
tags.text: <ResultT> The type to which this iterable will decode documents.

methods.commentText:
Returns a cursor of the operation represented by this iterable.

The result is wrapped in a {@code Task} since the iterator should be capable of asynchronously retrieve documents from the server.
methods.name: iterator

tags.name: @return
tags.text: an asynchronous task with cursor of the operation represented by this iterable.

methods.commentText:
Helper to return the first item in the iterator or null.

The result is wrapped in a {@code Task} since the iterator should be capable of asynchronously retrieve documents from the server.
methods.name: first

tags.name: @return
tags.text: a task containing the first item or null.
